question: 枝
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You're walking in the woods, when suddenly, a <vocabulary>branch</vocabulary> starts screaming at you, " <reading>Eh </reading>,  <reading>da </reading>d?" (<ja>えだ</ja>). The branch won't leave you alone, following you around while screaming "Eh, dad?", thinking you're its long-lost tree branch father. Poor thing.
